title: Out of the Ashes
description: Dean Banks is back in this sequel to Mysteries of the Red Coyote Inn, but can be a stand alone read.Here we find Dean Banks emerging from his Vision Quest with more powers from the ancient spirit gods to enable him to fight a powerful enemy which has threatened to destroy a sacred gold mine, the Superstition Mountains and many lives in its path. He will unlock the key to the mysterious underground world of these mountains where a diabolical plot is unfolding to destroy mankind. Dean and readers will finally come full circle with this one as the ending has a special spiritual message for all of us.
author: Lorraine Carey
